    Animation overview

    Let see what is available for antimation

    General idea

    • use saveGIF
    • or saveVideo (animation package)
    • or use gganimate: link

    saveGIF

    General overview with executable examples: link

    Other Examples here:

    • link1
    • link2

    Before it will work you need to install one of this:

    • ImageMagick (how to install on MAC)
    • GraphicsMagick (how ot install GraphicsMagick on Windows). In saveGIF function, you have to use option convert = ‘gm convert’

    Note: N of steps, is controled by nmax in saveGIF does this. Alternativelly, change in globally with ani.options(“nmax” = 50)

    Example with brownian.motion
